statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.12}+{5.11}\right)}={20.46}\approx{20.46}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{5.11}\cdot{4.90}={25.039}\approx{25}.
